EmailTemplate.name: Incorporator Fax Signature
EmailTemplate.subject: Incorporator Fax Signature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your incorporation order. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: • Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support Team. • Print two (2) copies of the document on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • Please sign your name in black ink on both copies as the incorporator where indicated. • Mail the documents to our address listed below.
LegalZoom.com, Inc. 101 N. Brand Blvd., 10th Floor POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91209-9096 Attn: Business Filings (Order #XXXXXXX)
• Alternatively, you can fax the signed documents to (323) 962-4521. Please include your name and order number on the fax coversheet to ensure proper routing of your document to our processing team.
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
